imgui.gl3

Class ImGuiImplGl3

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.gl3.ImGuiImplGl3

  • public final class ImGuiImplGl3
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a straightforward port of the imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp.

    It do support a backup and restoring of the GL state in the same way the original Dear ImGui code does. Some of the very specific OpenGL variables may be ignored here, yet you can copy-paste this class in your codebase and modify the rendering routine in the way you'd like.

    This implementation has an ability to use a GLSL version provided during the initialization. Please read the documentation for the init(String).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Method to do an initialization of the ImGuiImplGl3 state. It SHOULD be called before calling of the renderDrawData(ImDrawData) method.

        Unlike in the init(String) method, here the glslVersion argument is omitted. Thus a "#version 130" string will be used instead.

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String glslVersion)
        Method to do an initialization of the ImGuiImplGl3 state. It SHOULD be called before calling of the renderDrawData(ImDrawData) method.

        Method takes an argument, which should be a valid GLSL string with the version to use. 

         ----------------------------------------
 OpenGL    GLSL      GLSL
 version   version   string
 ---------------------------------------
  2.0       110       "#version 110"
  2.1       120       "#version 120"
  3.0       130       "#version 130"
  3.1       140       "#version 140"
  3.2       150       "#version 150"
  3.3       330       "#version 330 core"
  4.0       400       "#version 400 core"
  4.1       410       "#version 410 core"
  4.2       420       "#version 410 core"
  4.3       430       "#version 430 core"
  ES 3.0    300       "#version 300 es"   = WebGL 2.0
 ---------------------------------------

        If the argument is null, then a "#version 130" string will be used by default.

        Parameters:
        glslVersion - string with the version of the GLSL

      • renderDrawData

        public void renderDrawData(imgui.ImDrawData drawData)
        Method to render ImDrawData into current OpenGL context.
        Parameters:
        drawData - draw data to render

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Call this method in the end of your application cycle to dispose resources used by ImGuiImplGl3.

      • updateFontsTexture

        public void updateFontsTexture()
        Method rebuilds the font atlas for Dear ImGui. Could be used to update application fonts in runtime.
